name: Writesonic
headline: AI Agent for SEO and Marketing
description:
Writesonic is the first AI agent that connects to your marketing tools (Ahrefs, Search Console, Reddit, SERP) to automate your entire SEO and content workflows - from research to rankings. While others give generic AI responses, we work with real data to grow your traffic.

Just chat with your AI agent:
"Research this topic" → Instant insights from 100+ sources, cited and verified
"Write about X" → SEO-optimized content that targets ranking gaps
"Help me rank for Y" → Complete strategies built on live SERP data
"Find quick wins" → Easy opportunities from positions 11-20

Your complete SEO workflow, automated:
- Research: Deep-dive competitor analysis that used to take days
- Create: Content that ranks, backed by real data from Ahrefs & SERP
- Optimize: Implementation plans that normally cost $5000+/month
- Track: Real-time monitoring with actionable recommendations

Used by 10M+ marketers. 15,000+ five-star reviews across G2, Trustpilot, and Capterra.

founders.name: Samanyou Garg, Founder
founders.description: Building AI agents that run your entire marketing department. Started before the AI hype, scaling beyond it. Computer science graduate from the University of Manchester. Awarded with the 2019 Global Undergraduate Awards (often referred to as the junior Nobel Prize) for research on Group Emotion Recognition using Machine Learning.

## Security first **An AI Agent You Can Trust**
Your content is your competitive edge. That's why Writesonic uses robust encryption and zero-retention policies to protect your data and preserve complete confidentiality. Enterprise-ready security with SOC 2, GDPR & HIPAA compliance built-in.
[Visit Our Trust Center![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/675867c183e453801feef23a_Arrow%20Right%27%202.svg)](https://writesonic.com/<https:/writesonic.trustcenter.sprinto.com/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720fae84c76a8d9e8f984db_Data%20Encryption.svg)
#### Data Encryption
Industry-standard AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit. Your data never leaves our secure infrastructure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720fae811cdbd04074e5a0d_Data%20Retention.svg)
#### Custom Data Retention
You control how long we keep your data. Set custom retention periods or delete instantly - you're always in control.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720fae8c0049ef43224d3b6_Data%20Polcy.svg)
#### Zero-Retention for LLMS
Your data is never used to train our AI. What happens in your workspace stays in your workspace.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720d0b1d5a192a69d60508d_Frame%201430106010.webp)
#### SOC 2 Type II
Rigorous security protocols. Every process audited and verified for maximum data protection.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720d0b11d20b92a61188cb8_660e8a1a56156af4dfb21382_Mask%20group%201.webp)
#### GDPR Compliant
Complete data privacy control. Access, modify, or delete your data anytime - no questions asked.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f9e6bc06267864b5770e6/6720fb61dc7e5452242728d1_hipaa-compliant-icon%201.svg)
#### HIPAA
Healthcare-ready security. Stringent measures to protect sensitive health information and maintain compliance.

generated_description:
Writesonic is a dynamic software company founded in 2021 and based out of San Francisco. It emerged as a trailblazer in the AI marketing landscape, specifically focusing on SEO and content creation. Being part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Writesonic takes the concept of AI and integrates it seamlessly with essential marketing tools like Ahrefs, Google Search Console, and HubSpot. 

Their mission is straightforward: to create an AI agent that not only processes data but understands it deeply, providing real insights. Instead of generic responses that you might expect from standard AI platforms, Writesonic taps into real-time data to assist users with their marketing strategies. This leads to more effective content creation, robust SEO tactics, and overall traffic growth. 

The platform's features are strikingly user-friendly:
- **Research**: Users can request topic research and get instant insights from over a hundred sources, all verified and cited.
- **Content Creation**: The AI generates SEO-optimized content that targets specific keywords and ranking gaps, making it fresh and relevant.
- **Optimization**: It offers strategic implementation plans that replace the need for expensive consultation services.
- **Tracking**: Users can monitor their performance in real time and receive actionable recommendations based on live SERP data.

With over 10 million marketers utilizing its services and receiving more than 15,000 five-star reviews across platforms like G2, Trustpilot, and Capterra, Writesonic stands out as a trusted tool for many businesses. The company is not just about creating content; it’s about generating effective marketing workflows that save time and resources while enhancing brand visibility.

The team, comprising around 30 employees, is spearheaded by Group Partner Jared Friedman. Writesonic is recognized for its innovative approach to artificial intelligence, generative AI, and SaaS solutions in the B2B space.

In summary, Writesonic is more than just an AI tool; it’s a comprehensive marketing assistant. It offers a promise of efficiency, quality, and growth in the unpredictable digital landscape, making it a compelling choice for marketers looking to stay ahead. If you want to experience this powerful platform, you can explore more at [Writesonic.com](https://writesonic.com).
